name: Materials Science Virtual 2020
content: Magnus group extends a warm welcome to join our webinar entitled “Materials Science Virtual 2020” on November 16-17, 2020\. This webinar is creating a cross disciplinary meeting that transcends departmental, institutional, industrial, public and private research organizations and lends itself to the integration of research and education in the vital field of advanced materials, minerals and metallurgy. For more information, visit: https://www.magnuswebinars.com/materials-science-virtual/ Recommended: Materials Science Virtual 2020 | Materials Science Webinars 2020 | Materials Science Online Conferences | Materials Science Online Event 2020 | Metallurgy Webinars | Minerals Research Webinars | Materials Science Online Meetings | Webinar for Metallurgy | Materials Science Webinar 2020
